scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec --globals 'Intl,IntlPolyfill' test

lint.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --recursive -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

lint.quality: npm run buddyjs && npm run inspectjs && npm run lint
lint.test-acceptance: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec --globals 'Intl,IntlPolyfill' $(find test/**/acceptance test/acceptance -name '*.js' 2>/dev/null)
lint.test-changed: NODE_ENV=test mocha --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec --globals 'Intl,IntlPolyfill' $(git diff --name-only test | grep -E '(\.js)$')
lint.test-component: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec --globals 'Intl,IntlPolyfill' $(find test/**/component test/component -name *.js 2>/dev/null)
lint.test-unit: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec --globals 'Intl,IntlPolyfill' $(find test/**/unit test/unit -name '*.js' 2>/dev/null)
